00025 /*
00026  * lustre/target/update_trans.c
00027  *
00028  * This file implements the update distribute transaction API.
00029  *
00030  * To manage the cross-MDT operation (distribute operation) transaction,
00031  * the transaction will also be separated two layers on MD stack, top
00032  * transaction and sub transaction.
00033  *
00034  * During the distribute operation, top transaction is created in the LOD
00035  * layer, and represent the operation. Sub transaction is created by
00036  * each OSD or OSP. Top transaction start/stop will trigger all of its sub
00037  * transaction start/stop. Top transaction (the whole operation) is committed
00038  * only all of its sub transaction are committed.
00039  *
00040  * there are three kinds of transactions
00041  * 1. local transaction: All updates are in a single local OSD.
00042  * 2. Remote transaction: All Updates are only in the remote OSD,
00043  *    i.e. locally all updates are in OSP.
00044  * 3. Mixed transaction: Updates are both in local OSD and remote
00045  *    OSD.
00046  *
00047  * Author: Di Wang <di.wang@intel.com>
00048  */
00049 
00050 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00051 
00052 #include <linux/kthread.h>
00053 #include <lu_target.h>
00054 #include <lustre_log.h>
00055 #include <lustre_update.h>
00056 #include <obd.h>
00057 #include <obd_class.h>
00058 #include <tgt_internal.h>

00060 #include <tgt_internal.h>
00069 static void top_multiple_thandle_dump(struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt,
00070                                       __u32 mask)
00071 {
00072         struct sub_thandle      *st;
00073 
00074         LASSERT(tmt->tmt_magic == TOP_THANDLE_MAGIC);
00075         CDEBUG(mask, "%s tmt %p refcount %d committed %d result %d"
00076                "batchid "LPU64"\n",
00077                tmt->tmt_master_sub_dt ?
00078                tmt->tmt_master_sub_dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name :
00079                "NULL",
00080                tmt, atomic_read(&tmt->tmt_refcount), tmt->tmt_committed,
00081                tmt->tmt_result, tmt->tmt_batchid);
00082 
00083         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00084                 struct sub_thandle_cookie *stc;
00085 
00086                 CDEBUG(mask, "st %p obd %s committed %d stopped %d sub_th %p\n",
00087                        st, st->st_dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name,
00088                        st->st_committed, st->st_stopped, st->st_sub_th);
00089 
00090                 list_for_each_entry(stc, &st->st_cookie_list, stc_list) {
00091                         CDEBUG(mask, " cookie "DOSTID": %u\n",
00092                                POSTID(&stc->stc_cookie.lgc_lgl.lgl_oi),
00093                                stc->stc_cookie.lgc_index);
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 }

00112 static int sub_declare_updates_write(const struct lu_env *env,
00113                                      struct llog_update_record *record,
00114                                      struct thandle *sub_th, size_t record_size)
00115 {
00116         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00117         struct dt_device        *dt = sub_th->th_dev;
00118         int                     left = record_size;
00119         int rc;
00120 
00121         /* If ctxt is NULL, it means not need to write update,
00122          * for example if the the OSP is used to connect to OST */
00123         ctxt = llog_get_context(dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd,
00124                                 LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
00125 
00126         /* Not ready to record updates yet. */
00127         if (ctxt == NULL || ctxt->loc_handle == NULL) {
00128                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00129                 return 0;
00130         }
00131 
00132         rc = llog_declare_add(env, ctxt->loc_handle,
00133                               &record->lur_hdr, sub_th);
00134         if (rc < 0)
00135                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
00136 
00137         while (left > ctxt->loc_chunk_size) {
00138                 rc = llog_declare_add(env, ctxt->loc_handle,
00139                                       &record->lur_hdr, sub_th);
00140                 if (rc < 0)
00141                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00142 
00143                 left -= ctxt->loc_chunk_size;
00144         }
00145 
00146 out_put:
00147         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00148 
00149         return rc;
00150 }
00151 
00167 static int sub_updates_write(const struct lu_env *env,
00168                              struct llog_update_record *record,
00169                              struct sub_thandle *sub_th)
00170 {
00171         struct dt_device        *dt = sub_th->st_dt;
00172         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00173         int                     rc;
00174         struct llog_update_record *lur = NULL;
00175         struct update_params    *params = NULL;
00176         __u32                   update_count = 0;
00177         __u32                   param_count = 0;
00178         __u32                   last_update_count = 0;
00179         __u32                   last_param_count = 0;
00180         void                    *src;
00181         void                    *start;
00182         void                    *next;
00183         struct sub_thandle_cookie *stc;
00184         ENTRY;
00185 
00186         ctxt = llog_get_context(dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd,
00187                                 LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
00188         /* If ctxt == NULL, then it means updates on OST (only happens
00189          * during migration), and we do not track those updates for now */
00190         /* If ctxt->loc_handle == NULL, then it does not need to record
00191          * update, usually happens in error handler path */
00192         if (ctxt == NULL || ctxt->loc_handle == NULL) {
00193                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00194                 RETURN(0);
00195         }
00196 
00197         /* Since the cross-MDT updates will includes both local
00198          * and remote updates, the update ops count must > 1 */
00199         LASSERT(record->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count > 1);
00200         LASSERTF(record->lur_hdr.lrh_len == llog_update_record_size(record),
00201                  "lrh_len %u record_size %zu\n", record->lur_hdr.lrh_len,
00202                  llog_update_record_size(record));
00203 
00204         if (likely(record->lur_hdr.lrh_len <= ctxt->loc_chunk_size)) {
00205                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(stc);
00206                 if (stc == NULL)
00207                         GOTO(llog_put, rc = -ENOMEM);
00208                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&stc->stc_list);
00209 
00210                 rc = llog_add(env, ctxt->loc_handle, &record->lur_hdr,
00211                               &stc->stc_cookie, sub_th->st_sub_th);
00212 
00213                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Add update log "DOSTID":%u: rc = %d\n",
00214                        dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name,
00215                        POSTID(&stc->stc_cookie.lgc_lgl.lgl_oi),
00216                        stc->stc_cookie.lgc_index, rc);
00217 
00218                 if (rc > 0) {
00219                         list_add(&stc->stc_list, &sub_th->st_cookie_list);
00220                         rc = 0;
00221                 } else {
00222                         OBD_FREE_PTR(stc);
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 GOTO(llog_put, rc);
00226         }
00227 
00228         /* Split the records into chunk_size update record */
00229         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(lur, ctxt->loc_chunk_size);
00230         if (lur == NULL)
00231                 GOTO(llog_put, rc = -ENOMEM);
00232 
00233         memcpy(lur, &record->lur_hdr, sizeof(record->lur_hdr));
00234         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count = 0;
00235         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count = 0;
00236         src = &record->lur_update_rec.ur_ops;
00237         start = next = src;
00238         lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00239         params = update_records_get_params(&record->lur_update_rec);
00240         do {
00241                 size_t rec_len;
00242 
00243                 if (update_count < record->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count) {
00244                         next = update_op_next_op((struct update_op *)src);
00245                 } else {
00246                         if (param_count == 0)
00247                                 next = update_records_get_params(
00248                                                 &record->lur_update_rec);
00249                         else
00250                                 next = (char *)src +
00251                                         object_update_param_size(
00252                                         (struct object_update_param *)src);
00253                 }
00254 
00255                 rec_len = cfs_size_round((unsigned long)(next - src));
00256                 /* If its size > llog chunk_size, then write current chunk to
00257                  * the update llog. */
00258                 if (lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len + rec_len + LLOG_MIN_REC_SIZE >
00259                     ctxt->loc_chunk_size ||
00260                     param_count == record->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count) {
00261                         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count =
00262                                 update_count > last_update_count ?
00263                                 update_count - last_update_count : 0;
00264                         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count = param_count -
00265                                                              last_param_count;
00266 
00267                         memcpy(&lur->lur_update_rec.ur_ops, start,
00268                                (unsigned long)(src - start));
00269                         if (last_update_count != 0)
00270                                 lur->lur_update_rec.ur_flags |=
00271                                                 UPDATE_RECORD_CONTINUE;
00272 
00273                         update_records_dump(&lur->lur_update_rec, D_INFO, true);
00274                         lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00275                         LASSERT(lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len <= ctxt->loc_chunk_size);
00276 
00277                         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(stc);
00278                         if (stc == NULL)
00279                                 GOTO(llog_put, rc = -ENOMEM);
00280                         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&stc->stc_list);
00281 
00282                         rc = llog_add(env, ctxt->loc_handle,
00283                                       &lur->lur_hdr,
00284                                       &stc->stc_cookie, sub_th->st_sub_th);
00285 
00286                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Add update log "DOSTID":%u"
00287                                " rc = %d\n", dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name,
00288                                POSTID(&stc->stc_cookie.lgc_lgl.lgl_oi),
00289                                stc->stc_cookie.lgc_index, rc);
00290 
00291                         if (rc > 0) {
00292                                 list_add(&stc->stc_list,
00293                                          &sub_th->st_cookie_list);
00294                                 rc = 0;
00295                         } else {
00296                                 OBD_FREE_PTR(stc);
00297                                 GOTO(llog_put, rc);
00298                         }
00299 
00300                         last_update_count = update_count;
00301                         last_param_count = param_count;
00302                         start = src;
00303                         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count = 0;
00304                         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count = 0;
00305                         lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00306                 }
00307 
00308                 src = next;
00309                 lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len += cfs_size_round(rec_len);
00310                 if (update_count < record->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count)
00311                         update_count++;
00312                 else if (param_count < record->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count)
00313                         param_count++;
00314                 else
00315                         break;
00316         } while (1);
00317 
00318 llog_put:
00319         if (lur != NULL)
00320                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(lur, ctxt->loc_chunk_size);
00321         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00322 
00323         RETURN(rc);
00324 }
00325 
00343 static int prepare_writing_updates(const struct lu_env *env,
00344                                    struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
00345 {
00346         struct thandle_update_records   *tur = tmt->tmt_update_records;
00347         struct llog_update_record       *lur;
00348         struct update_params *params;
00349         size_t params_size;
00350         size_t update_size;
00351 
00352         if (tur == NULL || tur->tur_update_records == NULL ||
00353             tur->tur_update_params == NULL)
00354                 return 0;
00355 
00356         lur = tur->tur_update_records;
00357         /* Extends the update records buffer if needed */
00358         params_size = update_params_size(tur->tur_update_params,
00359                                          tur->tur_update_param_count);
00360         LASSERT(lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count == 0);
00361         update_size = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00362         if (cfs_size_round(update_size + params_size) >
00363             tur->tur_update_records_buf_size) {
00364                 int rc;
00365 
00366                 rc = tur_update_records_extend(tur,
00367                         cfs_size_round(update_size + params_size));
00368                 if (rc < 0)
00369                         return rc;
00370 
00371                 lur = tur->tur_update_records;
00372         }
00373 
00374         params = update_records_get_params(&lur->lur_update_rec);
00375         memcpy(params, tur->tur_update_params, params_size);
00376 
00377         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count = tur->tur_update_param_count;
00378         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_batchid = tmt->tmt_batchid;
00379         /* Init update record header */
00380         lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00381         lur->lur_hdr.lrh_type = UPDATE_REC;
00382 
00383         /* Dump updates for debugging purpose */
00384         update_records_dump(&lur->lur_update_rec, D_INFO, true);
00385 
00386         return 0;
00387 }

00389 static inline int
00390 distribute_txn_commit_thread_running(struct lu_target *lut)
00391 {
00392         return lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_flags & SVC_RUNNING;
00393 }
00394 
00395 static inline int
00396 distribute_txn_commit_thread_stopped(struct lu_target *lut)
00397 {
00398         return lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_flags & SVC_STOPPED;
00399 }

00408 static void top_trans_committed_cb(struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
00409 {
00410         struct lu_target *lut;
00411         ENTRY;
00412 
00413         LASSERT(atomic_read(&tmt->tmt_refcount) > 0);
00414 
00415         top_multiple_thandle_dump(tmt, D_HA);
00416         tmt->tmt_committed = 1;
00417         lut = dt2lu_dev(tmt->tmt_master_sub_dt)->ld_site->ls_tgt;
00418         if (distribute_txn_commit_thread_running(lut))
00419                 wake_up(&lut->lut_tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq);
00420         RETURN_EXIT;
00421 }

00423 struct sub_thandle *lookup_sub_thandle(struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt,
00424                                        struct dt_device *dt_dev)
00425 {
00426         struct sub_thandle *st;
00427 
00428         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00429                 if (st->st_dt == dt_dev)
00430                         return st;
00431         }
00432         return NULL;
00433 }
00434 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lookup_sub_thandle);
00435 
00436 struct sub_thandle *create_sub_thandle(struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt,
00437                                        struct dt_device *dt_dev)
00438 {
00439         struct sub_thandle *st;
00440 
00441         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(st);
00442         if (st == NULL)
00443                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00444 
00445         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&st->st_sub_list);
00446         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&st->st_cookie_list);
00447         st->st_dt = dt_dev;
00448 
00449         list_add(&st->st_sub_list, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list);
00450         return st;
00451 }
00452 
00453 static void sub_trans_commit_cb_internal(struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt,
00454                                          struct thandle *sub_th, int err)
00455 {
00456         struct sub_thandle      *st;
00457         bool                    all_committed = true;
00458 
00459         /* Check if all sub thandles are committed */
00460         spin_lock(&tmt->tmt_sub_lock);
00461         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00462                 if (st->st_sub_th == sub_th) {
00463                         st->st_committed = 1;
00464                         st->st_result = err;
00465                 }
00466                 if (!st->st_committed)
00467                         all_committed = false;
00468         }
00469         spin_unlock(&tmt->tmt_sub_lock);
00470 
00471         if (tmt->tmt_result == 0)
00472                 tmt->tmt_result = err;
00473 
00474         if (all_committed)
00475                 top_trans_committed_cb(tmt);
00476 
00477         top_multiple_thandle_dump(tmt, D_INFO);
00478         top_multiple_thandle_put(tmt);
00479         RETURN_EXIT;
00480 }
00481 
00493 static void sub_trans_commit_cb(struct lu_env *env,
00494                                 struct thandle *sub_th,
00495                                 struct dt_txn_commit_cb *cb, int err)
00496 {
00497         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt = cb->dcb_data;
00498 
00499         sub_trans_commit_cb_internal(tmt, sub_th, err);
00500 }
00501 
00502 static void sub_thandle_register_commit_cb(struct sub_thandle *st,
00503                                     struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
00504 {
00505         LASSERT(st->st_sub_th != NULL);
00506         top_multiple_thandle_get(tmt);
00507         st->st_commit_dcb.dcb_func = sub_trans_commit_cb;
00508         st->st_commit_dcb.dcb_data = tmt;
00509         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&st->st_commit_dcb.dcb_linkage);
00510         dt_trans_cb_add(st->st_sub_th, &st->st_commit_dcb);
00511 }
00512 
00522 static void sub_trans_stop_cb(struct lu_env *env,
00523                               struct thandle *sub_th,
00524                               struct dt_txn_commit_cb *cb, int err)
00525 {
00526         struct sub_thandle              *st;
00527         struct top_multiple_thandle     *tmt = cb->dcb_data;
00528         ENTRY;
00529 
00530         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00531                 if (st->st_stopped)
00532                         continue;
00533 
00534                 if (st->st_dt == sub_th->th_dev) {
00535                         st->st_stopped = 1;
00536                         st->st_result = err;
00537                         break;
00538                 }
00539         }
00540 
00541         wake_up(&tmt->tmt_stop_waitq);
00542         RETURN_EXIT;
00543 }
00544 
00545 static void sub_thandle_register_stop_cb(struct sub_thandle *st,
00546                                          struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
00547 {
00548         st->st_stop_dcb.dcb_func = sub_trans_stop_cb;
00549         st->st_stop_dcb.dcb_data = tmt;
00550         st->st_stop_dcb.dcb_flags = DCB_TRANS_STOP;
00551         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&st->st_stop_dcb.dcb_linkage);
00552         dt_trans_cb_add(st->st_sub_th, &st->st_stop_dcb);
00553 }
00554 
00567 int sub_thandle_trans_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00568                              struct top_thandle *top_th,
00569                              struct sub_thandle *st)
00570 {
00571         struct thandle *sub_th;
00572 
00573         sub_th = dt_trans_create(env, st->st_dt);
00574         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00575                 return PTR_ERR(sub_th);
00576 
00577         sub_th->th_top = &top_th->tt_super;
00578         st->st_sub_th = sub_th;
00579 
00580         sub_th->th_wait_submit = 1;
00581         sub_thandle_register_stop_cb(st, top_th->tt_multiple_thandle);
00582         return 0;
00583 }
00584 
00597 struct thandle *
00598 top_trans_create(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *master_dev)
00599 {
00600         struct top_thandle      *top_th;
00601         struct thandle          *child_th;
00602 
00603         OBD_ALLOC_GFP(top_th, sizeof(*top_th), __GFP_IO);
00604         if (top_th == NULL)
00605                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00606 
00607         top_th->tt_super.th_top = &top_th->tt_super;
00608 
00609         if (master_dev != NULL) {
00610                 child_th = dt_trans_create(env, master_dev);
00611                 if (IS_ERR(child_th)) {
00612                         OBD_FREE_PTR(top_th);
00613                         return child_th;
00614                 }
00615 
00616                 child_th->th_top = &top_th->tt_super;
00617                 child_th->th_wait_submit = 1;
00618                 top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle = child_th;
00619 
00620                 top_th->tt_super.th_tags |= child_th->th_tags;
00621         }
00622         return &top_th->tt_super;
00623 }
00624 EXPORT_SYMBOL(top_trans_create);
00625 
00638 static int declare_updates_write(const struct lu_env *env,
00639                                  struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
00640 {
00641         struct llog_update_record *record;
00642         struct sub_thandle *st;
00643         int rc = 0;
00644 
00645         record = tmt->tmt_update_records->tur_update_records;
00646         /* Declare update write for all other target */
00647         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00648                 if (st->st_sub_th == NULL)
00649                         continue;
00650 
00651                 rc = sub_declare_updates_write(env, record, st->st_sub_th,
00652                                                tmt->tmt_record_size);
00653                 if (rc < 0)
00654                         break;
00655         }
00656 
00657         return rc;
00658 }
00659 
00667 static void distribute_txn_assign_batchid(struct top_multiple_thandle *new)
00668 {
00669         struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd;
00670         struct dt_device *dt = new->tmt_master_sub_dt;
00671         struct sub_thandle *st;
00672 
00673         LASSERT(dt != NULL);
00674         tdtd = dt2lu_dev(dt)->ld_site->ls_tgt->lut_tdtd;
00675         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
00676         new->tmt_batchid = tdtd->tdtd_batchid++;
00677         list_add_tail(&new->tmt_commit_list, &tdtd->tdtd_list);
00678         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
00679         list_for_each_entry(st, &new->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00680                 if (st->st_sub_th != NULL)
00681                         sub_thandle_register_commit_cb(st, new);
00682         }
00683         top_multiple_thandle_get(new);
00684         top_multiple_thandle_dump(new, D_INFO);
00685 }
00686 
00694 void distribute_txn_insert_by_batchid(struct top_multiple_thandle *new)
00695 {
00696         struct dt_device *dt = new->tmt_master_sub_dt;
00697         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt;
00698         struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd;
00699         struct sub_thandle *st;
00700         bool    at_head = false;
00701 
00702         LASSERT(dt != NULL);
00703         tdtd = dt2lu_dev(dt)->ld_site->ls_tgt->lut_tdtd;
00704 
00705         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
00706         list_for_each_entry_reverse(tmt, &tdtd->tdtd_list, tmt_commit_list) {
00707                 if (new->tmt_batchid > tmt->tmt_batchid) {
00708                         list_add(&new->tmt_commit_list, &tmt->tmt_commit_list);
00709                         break;
00710                 }
00711         }
00712         if (list_empty(&new->tmt_commit_list)) {
00713                 at_head = true;
00714                 list_add(&new->tmt_commit_list, &tdtd->tdtd_list);
00715         }
00716         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
00717 
00718         list_for_each_entry(st, &new->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00719                 if (st->st_sub_th != NULL)
00720                         sub_thandle_register_commit_cb(st, new);
00721         }
00722 
00723         top_multiple_thandle_get(new);
00724         top_multiple_thandle_dump(new, D_INFO);
00725         if (new->tmt_committed && at_head)
00726                 wake_up(&tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq);
00727 }
00728 
00750 static int prepare_multiple_node_trans(const struct lu_env *env,
00751                                        struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
00752 {
00753         struct thandle_update_records   *tur;
00754         int                             rc;
00755         ENTRY;
00756 
00757         if (tmt->tmt_update_records == NULL) {
00758                 tur = &update_env_info(env)->uti_tur;
00759                 rc = check_and_prepare_update_record(env, tur);
00760                 if (rc < 0)
00761                         RETURN(rc);
00762 
00763                 tmt->tmt_update_records = tur;
00764                 distribute_txn_assign_batchid(tmt);
00765         }
00766 
00767         rc = declare_updates_write(env, tmt);
00768 
00769         RETURN(rc);
00770 }
00771 
00784 int top_trans_start(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *master_dev,
00785                     struct thandle *th)
00786 {
00787         struct top_thandle      *top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle,
00788                                                        tt_super);
00789         struct sub_thandle              *st;
00790         struct top_multiple_thandle     *tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
00791         int                             rc = 0;
00792         ENTRY;
00793 
00794         if (tmt == NULL) {
00795                 if (th->th_sync)
00796                         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_sync = th->th_sync;
00797                 if (th->th_local)
00798                         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_local = th->th_local;
00799                 top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_tags = th->th_tags;
00800                 rc = dt_trans_start(env, top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_dev,
00801                                     top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle);
00802                 RETURN(rc);
00803         }
00804 
00805         tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
00806         rc = prepare_multiple_node_trans(env, tmt);
00807         if (rc < 0)
00808                 RETURN(rc);
00809 
00810         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00811                 if (st->st_sub_th == NULL)
00812                         continue;
00813                 if (th->th_sync)
00814                         st->st_sub_th->th_sync = th->th_sync;
00815                 if (th->th_local)
00816                         st->st_sub_th->th_local = th->th_local;
00817                 st->st_sub_th->th_tags = th->th_tags;
00818                 rc = dt_trans_start(env, st->st_sub_th->th_dev,
00819                                     st->st_sub_th);
00820                 if (rc != 0)
00821                         GOTO(out, rc);
00822 
00823                 LASSERT(st->st_started == 0);
00824                 st->st_started = 1;
00825         }
00826 out:
00827         th->th_result = rc;
00828         RETURN(rc);
00829 }
00830 EXPORT_SYMBOL(top_trans_start);
00831 
00844 static bool top_check_write_updates(struct top_thandle *top_th)
00845 {
00846         struct top_multiple_thandle     *tmt;
00847         struct thandle_update_records   *tur;
00848 
00849         /* Do not write updates to records if the transaction fails */
00850         if (top_th->tt_super.th_result != 0)
00851                 return false;
00852 
00853         tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
00854         if (tmt == NULL)
00855                 return false;
00856 
00857         tur = tmt->tmt_update_records;
00858         if (tur == NULL)
00859                 return false;
00860 
00861         /* Hmm, false update records, since the cross-MDT operation
00862          * should includes both local and remote updates, so the
00863          * updates count should >= 2 */
00864         if (tur->tur_update_records == NULL ||
00865             tur->tur_update_records->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count <= 1)
00866                 return false;
00867 
00868         return true;
00869 }
00870 
00882 static bool top_trans_is_stopped(struct top_thandle *top_th)
00883 {
00884         struct top_multiple_thandle     *tmt;
00885         struct sub_thandle              *st;
00886         bool                    all_stopped = true;
00887 
00888         tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
00889         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
00890                 if (!st->st_stopped && st->st_sub_th != NULL) {
00891                         all_stopped = false;
00892                         break;
00893                 }
00894 
00895                 if (st->st_result != 0 &&
00896                     top_th->tt_super.th_result == 0)
00897                         top_th->tt_super.th_result = st->st_result;
00898         }
00899 
00900         return all_stopped;
00901 }
00902 
00912 static int top_trans_wait_result(struct top_thandle *top_th)
00913 {
00914         struct l_wait_info      lwi = {0};
00915 
00916         l_wait_event(top_th->tt_multiple_thandle->tmt_stop_waitq,
00917                      top_trans_is_stopped(top_th), &lwi);
00918 
00919         RETURN(top_th->tt_super.th_result);
00920 }
00921 
00935 int top_trans_stop(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *master_dev,
00936                    struct thandle *th)
00937 {
00938         struct top_thandle      *top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle,
00939                                                        tt_super);
00940         struct sub_thandle              *st;
00941         struct sub_thandle              *master_st;
00942         struct top_multiple_thandle     *tmt;
00943         struct thandle_update_records   *tur;
00944         bool                            write_updates = false;
00945         int                     rc = 0;
00946         ENTRY;
00947 
00948         if (likely(top_th->tt_multiple_thandle == NULL)) {
00949                 LASSERT(master_dev != NULL);
00950 
00951                 if (th->th_sync)
00952                         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_sync = th->th_sync;
00953                 if (th->th_local)
00954                         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_local = th->th_local;
00955                 top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_tags = th->th_tags;
00956                 rc = dt_trans_stop(env, master_dev,
00957                                    top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle);
00958                 OBD_FREE_PTR(top_th);
00959                 RETURN(rc);
00960         }
00961 
00962         tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
00963         tur = tmt->tmt_update_records;
00964 
00965         /* Note: we need stop the master thandle first, then the stop
00966          * callback will fill the master transno in the update logs,
00967          * then these update logs will be sent to other MDTs */
00968         /* get the master sub thandle */
00969         master_st = lookup_sub_thandle(tmt, tmt->tmt_master_sub_dt);
00970         write_updates = top_check_write_updates(top_th);
00971 
00972         /* Step 1: write the updates log on Master MDT */
00973         if (master_st != NULL && master_st->st_sub_th != NULL &&
00974             write_updates) {
00975                 struct llog_update_record *lur;
00976 
00977                 /* Merge the parameters and updates into one buffer */
00978                 rc = prepare_writing_updates(env, tmt);
00979                 if (rc < 0) {
00980                         CERROR("%s: cannot prepare updates: rc = %d\n",
00981                                master_dev->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00982                         th->th_result = rc;
00983                         write_updates = false;
00984                         GOTO(stop_master_trans, rc);
00985                 }
00986 
00987                 lur = tur->tur_update_records;
00988                 /* Write updates to the master MDT */
00989                 rc = sub_updates_write(env, lur, master_st);
00990 
00991                 /* Cleanup the common parameters in the update records,
00992                  * master transno callback might add more parameters.
00993                  * and we need merge the update records again in the
00994                  * following */
00995                 if (tur->tur_update_params != NULL)
00996                         lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count = 0;
00997 
00998                 if (rc < 0) {
00999                         CERROR("%s: write updates failed: rc = %d\n",
01000                                master_dev->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
01001                         th->th_result = rc;
01002                         write_updates = false;
01003                         GOTO(stop_master_trans, rc);
01004                 }
01005         }
01006 
01007 stop_master_trans:
01008         /* Step 2: Stop the transaction on the master MDT, and fill the
01009          * master transno in the update logs to other MDT. */
01010         if (master_st != NULL && master_st->st_sub_th != NULL) {
01011                 if (th->th_local)
01012                         master_st->st_sub_th->th_local = th->th_local;
01013                 if (th->th_sync)
01014                         master_st->st_sub_th->th_sync = th->th_sync;
01015                 master_st->st_sub_th->th_tags = th->th_tags;
01016                 master_st->st_sub_th->th_result = th->th_result;
01017                 rc = dt_trans_stop(env, master_st->st_dt, master_st->st_sub_th);
01018                 /* If it does not write_updates, then we call submit callback
01019                  * here, otherwise callback is done through
01020                  * osd(osp)_trans_commit_cb() */
01021                 if (!master_st->st_started &&
01022                     !list_empty(&tmt->tmt_commit_list))
01023                         sub_trans_commit_cb_internal(tmt,
01024                                                 master_st->st_sub_th, rc);
01025                 if (rc < 0) {
01026                         th->th_result = rc;
01027                         GOTO(stop_other_trans, rc);
01028                 } else if (tur != NULL && tur->tur_update_records != NULL) {
01029                         struct llog_update_record *lur;
01030 
01031                         lur = tur->tur_update_records;
01032                         if (lur->lur_update_rec.ur_master_transno == 0)
01033                                 /* Update master transno after master stop
01034                                  * callback */
01035                                 lur->lur_update_rec.ur_master_transno =
01036                                                 tgt_th_info(env)->tti_transno;
01037                 }
01038         }
01039 
01040         /* Step 3: write updates to other MDTs */
01041         if (write_updates) {
01042                 struct llog_update_record *lur;
01043 
01044                 /* Stop callback of master will add more updates and also update
01045                  * master transno, so merge the parameters and updates into one
01046                  * buffer again */
01047                 rc = prepare_writing_updates(env, tmt);
01048                 if (rc < 0) {
01049                         CERROR("%s: prepare updates failed: rc = %d\n",
01050                                master_dev->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
01051                         th->th_result = rc;
01052                         GOTO(stop_other_trans, rc);
01053                 }
01054                 lur = tur->tur_update_records;
01055                 list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list,
01056                                     st_sub_list) {
01057                         if (st->st_sub_th == NULL || st == master_st ||
01058                             st->st_sub_th->th_result < 0)
01059                                 continue;
01060 
01061                         rc = sub_updates_write(env, lur, st);
01062                         if (rc < 0) {
01063                                 th->th_result = rc;
01064                                 break;
01065                         }
01066                 }
01067         }
01068 
01069 stop_other_trans:
01070         /* Step 4: Stop the transaction on other MDTs */
01071         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
01072                 if (st == master_st || st->st_sub_th == NULL)
01073                         continue;
01074 
01075                 if (th->th_sync)
01076                         st->st_sub_th->th_sync = th->th_sync;
01077                 if (th->th_local)
01078                         st->st_sub_th->th_local = th->th_local;
01079                 st->st_sub_th->th_tags = th->th_tags;
01080                 st->st_sub_th->th_result = th->th_result;
01081                 rc = dt_trans_stop(env, st->st_sub_th->th_dev,
01082                                    st->st_sub_th);
01083                 if (unlikely(rc < 0 && th->th_result == 0))
01084                         th->th_result = rc;
01085         }
01086 
01087         rc = top_trans_wait_result(top_th);
01088 
01089         tmt->tmt_result = rc;
01090 
01091         /* Balance for the refcount in top_trans_create, Note: if it is NOT
01092          * multiple node transaction, the top transaction will be destroyed. */
01093         top_multiple_thandle_put(tmt);
01094         OBD_FREE_PTR(top_th);
01095         RETURN(rc);
01096 }
01097 EXPORT_SYMBOL(top_trans_stop);
01098 
01112 int top_trans_create_tmt(const struct lu_env *env,
01113                          struct top_thandle *top_th)
01114 {
01115         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt;
01116 
01117         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(tmt);
01118         if (tmt == NULL)
01119                 return -ENOMEM;
01120 
01121         tmt->tmt_magic = TOP_THANDLE_MAGIC;
01122         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list);
01123         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tmt->tmt_commit_list);
01124         atomic_set(&tmt->tmt_refcount, 1);
01125         spin_lock_init(&tmt->tmt_sub_lock);
01126         init_waitqueue_head(&tmt->tmt_stop_waitq);
01127 
01128         top_th->tt_multiple_thandle = tmt;
01129 
01130         return 0;
01131 }
01132 
01133 static struct sub_thandle *
01134 create_sub_thandle_with_thandle(struct top_thandle *top_th,
01135                                 struct thandle *sub_th)
01136 {
01137         struct sub_thandle *st;
01138 
01139         /* create and init sub th to the top trans list */
01140         st = create_sub_thandle(top_th->tt_multiple_thandle,
01141                                 sub_th->th_dev);
01142         if (IS_ERR(st))
01143                 return st;
01144 
01145         st->st_sub_th = sub_th;
01146 
01147         sub_th->th_top = &top_th->tt_super;
01148         sub_thandle_register_stop_cb(st, top_th->tt_multiple_thandle);
01149         return st;
01150 }
01151 
01164 struct thandle *thandle_get_sub_by_dt(const struct lu_env *env,
01165                                       struct thandle *th,
01166                                       struct dt_device *sub_dt)
01167 {
01168         struct sub_thandle      *st = NULL;
01169         struct sub_thandle      *master_st = NULL;
01170         struct top_thandle      *top_th;
01171         struct thandle          *sub_th = NULL;
01172         int                     rc = 0;
01173         ENTRY;
01174 
01175         top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle, tt_super);
01176 
01177         if (likely(sub_dt == top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_dev))
01178                 RETURN(top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle);
01179 
01180         if (top_th->tt_multiple_thandle != NULL) {
01181                 st = lookup_sub_thandle(top_th->tt_multiple_thandle, sub_dt);
01182                 if (st != NULL)
01183                         RETURN(st->st_sub_th);
01184         }
01185 
01186         sub_th = dt_trans_create(env, sub_dt);
01187         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
01188                 RETURN(sub_th);
01189 
01190         /* Create top_multiple_thandle if necessary */
01191         if (top_th->tt_multiple_thandle == NULL) {
01192                 struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt;
01193 
01194                 rc = top_trans_create_tmt(env, top_th);
01195                 if (rc < 0)
01196                         GOTO(stop_trans, rc);
01197 
01198                 tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
01199 
01200                 /* Add master sub th to the top trans list */
01201                 tmt->tmt_master_sub_dt =
01202                         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle->th_dev;
01203                 master_st = create_sub_thandle_with_thandle(top_th,
01204                                         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle);
01205                 if (IS_ERR(master_st)) {
01206                         rc = PTR_ERR(master_st);
01207                         master_st = NULL;
01208                         GOTO(stop_trans, rc);
01209                 }
01210         }
01211 
01212         /* create and init sub th to the top trans list */
01213         st = create_sub_thandle_with_thandle(top_th, sub_th);
01214         if (IS_ERR(st)) {
01215                 rc = PTR_ERR(st);
01216                 st = NULL;
01217                 GOTO(stop_trans, rc);
01218         }
01219         st->st_sub_th->th_wait_submit = 1;
01220 stop_trans:
01221         if (rc < 0) {
01222                 if (master_st != NULL) {
01223                         list_del(&master_st->st_sub_list);
01224                         OBD_FREE_PTR(master_st);
01225                 }
01226                 sub_th->th_result = rc;
01227                 dt_trans_stop(env, sub_dt, sub_th);
01228                 sub_th = ERR_PTR(rc);
01229         }
01230 
01231         RETURN(sub_th);
01232 }
01233 EXPORT_SYMBOL(thandle_get_sub_by_dt);
01234 
01242 void top_multiple_thandle_destroy(struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
01243 {
01244         struct sub_thandle *st;
01245         struct sub_thandle *tmp;
01246 
01247         LASSERT(tmt->tmt_magic == TOP_THANDLE_MAGIC);
01248         list_for_each_entry_safe(st, tmp, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list,
01249                                  st_sub_list) {
01250                 struct sub_thandle_cookie *stc;
01251                 struct sub_thandle_cookie *tmp;
01252 
01253                 list_del(&st->st_sub_list);
01254                 list_for_each_entry_safe(stc, tmp, &st->st_cookie_list,
01255                                          stc_list) {
01256                         list_del(&stc->stc_list);
01257                         OBD_FREE_PTR(stc);
01258                 }
01259                 OBD_FREE_PTR(st);
01260         }
01261         OBD_FREE_PTR(tmt);
01262 }
01263 EXPORT_SYMBOL(top_multiple_thandle_destroy);
01264 
01277 static int distribute_txn_cancel_records(const struct lu_env *env,
01278                                          struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt)
01279 {
01280         struct sub_thandle *st;
01281         ENTRY;
01282 
01283         top_multiple_thandle_dump(tmt, D_INFO);
01284         /* Cancel update logs on other MDTs */
01285         list_for_each_entry(st, &tmt->tmt_sub_thandle_list, st_sub_list) {
01286                 struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
01287                 struct obd_device       *obd;
01288                 struct llog_cookie      *cookie;
01289                 struct sub_thandle_cookie *stc;
01290                 int rc;
01291 
01292                 obd = st->st_dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd;
01293                 ctxt = llog_get_context(obd, LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
01294                 if (ctxt == NULL)
01295                         continue;
01296                 list_for_each_entry(stc, &st->st_cookie_list, stc_list) {
01297                         cookie = &stc->stc_cookie;
01298                         if (fid_is_zero(&cookie->lgc_lgl.lgl_oi.oi_fid))
01299                                 continue;
01300 
01301                         rc = llog_cat_cancel_records(env, ctxt->loc_handle, 1,
01302                                                      cookie);
01303                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: batchid %llu cancel update log "
01304                                DOSTID ".%u : rc = %d\n", obd->obd_name,
01305                                tmt->tmt_batchid,
01306                                POSTID(&cookie->lgc_lgl.lgl_oi),
01307                                cookie->lgc_index, rc);
01308                 }
01309 
01310                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
01311         }
01312 
01313         RETURN(0);
01314 }
01315 
01330 static bool tdtd_ready_for_cancel_log(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd)
01331 {
01332         struct top_multiple_thandle     *tmt = NULL;
01333         struct obd_device               *obd = tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd;
01334         bool    ready = false;
01335 
01336         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01337         if (!list_empty(&tdtd->tdtd_list)) {
01338                 tmt = list_entry(tdtd->tdtd_list.next,
01339                                  struct top_multiple_thandle, tmt_commit_list);
01340                 if (tmt->tmt_committed &&
01341                     (!obd->obd_recovering || (obd->obd_recovering &&
01342                     tmt->tmt_batchid <= tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid)))
01343                         ready = true;
01344         }
01345         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01346 
01347         return ready;
01348 }
01349 
01350 struct distribute_txn_bid_data {
01351         struct dt_txn_commit_cb  dtbd_cb;
01352         struct target_distribute_txn_data      *dtbd_tdtd;
01353         __u64                    dtbd_batchid;
01354 };
01355 
01367 static void distribute_txn_batchid_cb(struct lu_env *env,
01368                                       struct thandle *th,
01369                                       struct dt_txn_commit_cb *cb,
01370                                       int err)
01371 {
01372         struct distribute_txn_bid_data          *dtbd = NULL;
01373         struct target_distribute_txn_data       *tdtd;
01374 
01375         dtbd = container_of0(cb, struct distribute_txn_bid_data, dtbd_cb);
01376         tdtd = dtbd->dtbd_tdtd;
01377 
01378         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: %llu batchid updated\n",
01379               tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name, dtbd->dtbd_batchid);
01380         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01381         if (dtbd->dtbd_batchid > tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid &&
01382             !tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_no_transno)
01383                 tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid = dtbd->dtbd_batchid;
01384         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01385         atomic_dec(&tdtd->tdtd_refcount);
01386         wake_up(&tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq);
01387 
01388         OBD_FREE_PTR(dtbd);
01389 }
01390 
01404 static int
01405 distribute_txn_commit_batchid_update(const struct lu_env *env,
01406                               struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
01407                               __u64 batchid)
01408 {
01409         struct distribute_txn_bid_data  *dtbd = NULL;
01410         struct thandle          *th;
01411         struct lu_buf            buf;
01412         __u64                    tmp;
01413         __u64                    off;
01414         int                      rc;
01415         ENTRY;
01416 
01417         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(dtbd);
01418         if (dtbd == NULL)
01419                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01420         dtbd->dtbd_batchid = batchid;
01421         dtbd->dtbd_tdtd = tdtd;
01422         dtbd->dtbd_cb.dcb_func = distribute_txn_batchid_cb;
01423         atomic_inc(&tdtd->tdtd_refcount);
01424 
01425         th = dt_trans_create(env, tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_bottom);
01426         if (IS_ERR(th)) {
01427                 OBD_FREE_PTR(dtbd);
01428                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
01429         }
01430 
01431         tmp = cpu_to_le64(batchid);
01432         buf.lb_buf = &tmp;
01433         buf.lb_len = sizeof(tmp);
01434         off = 0;
01435 
01436         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj, &buf, off,
01437                                      th);
01438         if (rc < 0)
01439                 GOTO(stop, rc);
01440 
01441         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_bottom, th);
01442         if (rc < 0)
01443                 GOTO(stop, rc);
01444 
01445         rc = dt_trans_cb_add(th, &dtbd->dtbd_cb);
01446         if (rc < 0)
01447                 GOTO(stop, rc);
01448 
01449         rc = dt_record_write(env, tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj, &buf,
01450                              &off, th);
01451 
01452         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: update batchid "LPU64": rc = %d\n",
01453                tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name, batchid, rc);
01454 
01455 stop:
01456         dt_trans_stop(env, tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_bottom, th);
01457         if (rc < 0)
01458                 OBD_FREE_PTR(dtbd);
01459         RETURN(rc);
01460 }
01461 
01473 static int
01474 distribute_txn_commit_batchid_init(const struct lu_env *env,
01475                                    struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd)
01476 {
01477         struct tgt_thread_info  *tti = tgt_th_info(env);
01478         struct lu_target        *lut = tdtd->tdtd_lut;
01479         struct lu_attr          *attr = &tti->tti_attr;
01480         struct lu_fid           *fid = &tti->tti_fid1;
01481         struct dt_object_format *dof = &tti->tti_u.update.tti_update_dof;
01482         struct dt_object        *dt_obj = NULL;
01483         struct lu_buf           buf;
01484         __u64                   tmp;
01485         __u64                   off;
01486         int                     rc;
01487         ENTRY;
01488 
01489         memset(attr, 0, sizeof(*attr));
01490         attr->la_valid = LA_MODE;
01491         attr->la_mode = S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR;
01492         dof->dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(S_IFREG);
01493 
01494         lu_local_obj_fid(fid, BATCHID_COMMITTED_OID);
01495 
01496         dt_obj = dt_find_or_create(env, lut->lut_bottom, fid, dof,
01497                                    attr);
01498         if (IS_ERR(dt_obj)) {
01499                 rc = PTR_ERR(dt_obj);
01500                 dt_obj = NULL;
01501                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01502         }
01503 
01504         tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj = dt_obj;
01505 
01506         buf.lb_buf = &tmp;
01507         buf.lb_len = sizeof(tmp);
01508         off = 0;
01509         rc = dt_read(env, dt_obj, &buf, &off);
01510         if (rc < 0 || (rc < buf.lb_len && rc > 0)) {
01511                 CERROR("%s can't read last committed batchid: rc = %d\n",
01512                        tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name, rc);
01513                 if (rc > 0)
01514                         rc = -EINVAL;
01515                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01516         } else if (rc == buf.lb_len) {
01517                 tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid = le64_to_cpu(tmp);
01518                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: committed batchid %llu\n",
01519                        tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name,
01520                        tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid);
01521                 rc = 0;
01522         }
01523 
01524 out_put:
01525         if (rc < 0 && dt_obj != NULL) {
01526                 lu_object_put(env, &dt_obj->do_lu);
01527                 tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj = NULL;
01528         }
01529         return rc;
01530 }
01531 
01544 static int distribute_txn_commit_thread(void *_arg)
01545 {
01546         struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd = _arg;
01547         struct lu_target        *lut = tdtd->tdtd_lut;
01548         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread;
01549         struct l_wait_info       lwi = { 0 };
01550         struct lu_env            env;
01551         struct list_head         list;
01552         int                      rc;
01553         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt;
01554         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmp;
01555         __u64                    batchid = 0, committed;
01556 
01557         ENTRY;
01558 
01559         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL | LCT_MD_THREAD);
01560         if (rc != 0)
01561                 RETURN(rc);
01562 
01563         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01564         thread->t_flags = SVC_RUNNING;
01565         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01566         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
01567         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&list);
01568 
01569         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: start commit thread committed batchid "LPU64"\n",
01570                tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name,
01571                tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid);
01572 
01573         while (distribute_txn_commit_thread_running(lut)) {
01574                 spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01575                 list_for_each_entry_safe(tmt, tmp, &tdtd->tdtd_list,
01576                                          tmt_commit_list) {
01577                         if (tmt->tmt_committed == 0)
01578                                 break;
01579 
01580                         /* Note: right now, replay is based on master MDT
01581                          * transno, but cancellation is based on batchid.
01582                          * so we do not try to cancel the update log until
01583                          * the recoverying is done, unless the update records
01584                          * batchid < committed_batchid. */
01585                         if (tmt->tmt_batchid <= tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid) {
01586                                 list_move_tail(&tmt->tmt_commit_list, &list);
01587                         } else if (!tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_recovering) {
01588                                 LASSERTF(tmt->tmt_batchid >= batchid,
01589                                          "tmt %p tmt_batchid: "LPU64", batchid "
01590                                           LPU64"\n", tmt, tmt->tmt_batchid,
01591                                          batchid);
01592                                 /* There are three types of distribution
01593                                  * transaction result
01594                                  *
01595                                  * 1. If tmt_result < 0, it means the
01596                                  * distribution transaction fails, which should
01597                                  * be rare, because once declare phase succeeds,
01598                                  * the operation should succeeds anyway. Note in
01599                                  * this case, we will still update batchid so
01600                                  * cancellation would be stopped.
01601                                  *
01602                                  * 2. If tmt_result == 0, it means the
01603                                  * distribution transaction succeeds, and we
01604                                  * will update batchid.
01605                                  *
01606                                  * 3. If tmt_result > 0, it means distribute
01607                                  * transaction is not yet committed on every
01608                                  * node, but we need release this tmt before
01609                                  * that, which usuually happens during umount.
01610                                  */
01611                                 if (tmt->tmt_result <= 0)
01612                                         batchid = tmt->tmt_batchid;
01613                                 list_move_tail(&tmt->tmt_commit_list, &list);
01614                         }
01615                 }
01616                 spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01617 
01618                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: batchid: "LPU64" committed batchid "
01619                        LPU64"\n", tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name, batchid,
01620                        tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid);
01621                 /* update globally committed on a storage */
01622                 if (batchid > tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid) {
01623                         rc = distribute_txn_commit_batchid_update(&env, tdtd,
01624                                                              batchid);
01625                         if (rc == 0)
01626                                 batchid = 0;
01627                 }
01628                 /* cancel the records for committed batchid's */
01629                 /* XXX: should we postpone cancel's till the end of recovery? */
01630                 committed = tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid;
01631                 list_for_each_entry_safe(tmt, tmp, &list, tmt_commit_list) {
01632                         if (tmt->tmt_batchid > committed)
01633                                 break;
01634                         list_del_init(&tmt->tmt_commit_list);
01635                         if (tmt->tmt_result <= 0)
01636                                 distribute_txn_cancel_records(&env, tmt);
01637                         top_multiple_thandle_put(tmt);
01638                 }
01639 
01640                 l_wait_event(tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq,
01641                              !distribute_txn_commit_thread_running(lut) ||
01642                              committed < tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid ||
01643                              tdtd_ready_for_cancel_log(tdtd), &lwi);
01644         };
01645 
01646         l_wait_event(tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq,
01647                      atomic_read(&tdtd->tdtd_refcount) == 0, &lwi);
01648 
01649         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01650         list_for_each_entry_safe(tmt, tmp, &tdtd->tdtd_list,
01651                                  tmt_commit_list)
01652                 list_move_tail(&tmt->tmt_commit_list, &list);
01653         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01654 
01655         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s stopping distribute txn commit thread.\n",
01656                tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name);
01657         list_for_each_entry_safe(tmt, tmp, &list, tmt_commit_list) {
01658                 list_del_init(&tmt->tmt_commit_list);
01659                 top_multiple_thandle_dump(tmt, D_HA);
01660                 top_multiple_thandle_put(tmt);
01661         }
01662 
01663         thread->t_flags = SVC_STOPPED;
01664         lu_env_fini(&env);
01665         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
01666 
01667         RETURN(0);
01668 }
01669 
01681 int distribute_txn_init(const struct lu_env *env,
01682                         struct lu_target *lut,
01683                         struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
01684                         __u32 index)
01685 {
01686         struct task_struct      *task;
01687         struct l_wait_info       lwi = { 0 };
01688         int                     rc;
01689         ENTRY;
01690 
01691         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tdtd->tdtd_list);
01692         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_finish_list);
01693         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list);
01694         spin_lock_init(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01695         spin_lock_init(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
01696         tdtd->tdtd_replay_handler = distribute_txn_replay_handle;
01697         tdtd->tdtd_replay_ready = 0;
01698 
01699         tdtd->tdtd_batchid = lut->lut_last_transno + 1;
01700 
01701         init_waitqueue_head(&lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
01702         init_waitqueue_head(&tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq);
01703         init_waitqueue_head(&tdtd->tdtd_recovery_threads_waitq);
01704         atomic_set(&tdtd->tdtd_refcount, 0);
01705         atomic_set(&tdtd->tdtd_recovery_threads_count, 0);
01706 
01707         tdtd->tdtd_lut = lut;
01708         rc = distribute_txn_commit_batchid_init(env, tdtd);
01709         if (rc != 0)
01710                 RETURN(rc);
01711 
01712         task = kthread_run(distribute_txn_commit_thread, tdtd, "tdtd-%u",
01713                            index);
01714         if (IS_ERR(task))
01715                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(task));
01716 
01717         l_wait_event(lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
01718                      distribute_txn_commit_thread_running(lut) ||
01719                      distribute_txn_commit_thread_stopped(lut), &lwi);
01720         RETURN(0);
01721 }
01722 EXPORT_SYMBOL(distribute_txn_init);
01723 
01732 void distribute_txn_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
01733                          struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd)
01734 {
01735         struct lu_target *lut = tdtd->tdtd_lut;
01736 
01737         /* Stop cancel thread */
01738         if (lut == NULL || !distribute_txn_commit_thread_running(lut))
01739                 return;
01740 
01741         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01742         lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_flags = SVC_STOPPING;
01743         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
01744         wake_up(&tdtd->tdtd_commit_thread_waitq);
01745         wait_event(lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
01746                    lut->lut_tdtd_commit_thread.t_flags & SVC_STOPPED);
01747 
01748         dtrq_list_destroy(tdtd);
01749         if (tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj != NULL) {
01750                 lu_object_put(env, &tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj->do_lu);
01751                 tdtd->tdtd_batchid_obj = NULL;
01752         }
01753 }
01754 EXPORT_SYMBOL(distribute_txn_fini);
